title: Star Guardian Taliyah  [unfinished]
body:
https://imgur.com/3MBPqFt
Im working on a star guardian team fanart.  Next are Kayn then Ekko, the last two arent decided yet, maybe Kat or Xayah (if i do xayah im doing rakan too).

replies.body: id love a star guardian morgana
id even like karma or quinn
Oooohhhj. SG Quinn!  That'd be adorable! :D
Looks awesome!  Along with Taliyah.. i'm personally hoping leona's gonna get some love soon. either as a SG (she's a sun knight, - star guardian) or in a Vs event like yas/riven with leona/diana.
If they were to make another SG team i definitely wish it would be Taliyah alongside Xayah, Rakan and Kat as the leader. Although i might be a bit biased as a Kat main. :P

Yeah as an ex kat main id love to see that skin (and she has no legendaries yet) but she did just get a skin this patch.  Personally though, i'd rather get a skin line called "date night" with her and garen, Ezreal and Lux, Vi and Cait, Lulu and Veig, Ekko and Jinx.

That never stopped Ahri from getting a legendary skin not even a year after her Arcade one. ;)
But for reals, I think Xayah, Rakan and Taliyah are a MUST for the next batch if they ever decide to do Star Guardians again.  Xayah - red, Rakan - blue and Taliyah - yellow/orange.
They implied SG skins are going to annual so they probs will.

I'm dreaming of a SG Tal since she was released, I had high hope for this year's SG skins T__T

Speaking of your concept, I especially like the little wing on her shoulder, and how the short cape falls aroung her shoulders like ashort scarf (compared to, e.g. ezreal's cape which is a lot more stiff and formal). Keep on drawing! :D

It actually is a scarf inspired by various desert clothes it replaces the ribbons other SGs have coming out of ther emblems, and yeah Ez's stiffness rlly turned me away from buying the skin, along with over exagerated hairdo.
I'm a fan of character design and I love to hear the reasoning behind the choices of character's clothes designs. I really should try my own design for GS Tal, maybe one day... ^^
For star guardian skins? I'd kinda wanna see Tristana if that gives you an idea. Or maybe like something really interesting would be Akali.
I have trouble viewing akali as a SG.  The  skins i have envisioned are very steampunky, and i dont think thatd fit.  A yordle might be a good idea though...
